modShortDescription: This mod reduces the crafting time about 50%. It also takes care of the anvil (new 20%) and other pre defined crafting improvements.
modDescription:
This mod reduces the crafting time about 50%. It also takes care of the anvil (new 20%) and other pre defined crafting improvements like progression level and Nerd Glasses.

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1LE7GQEVOcS4VnYSkryzc-Qxkfcti_zCj)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/21413-fr3ak4ls-a19-modlets/).

**Credits:** [fr3ak4l](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/fr3ak4l/)
